data.name: Missing Love
data.detailed_description:
-Warning-


English version available now on demo
English Buy version coming soon ; )

-Plot-


In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately.
For five years, you'll play Elijah Sanders, a private investigator whose partner is Lieutenant Anthony Williams.
victim woman named Kate Hernandez, who is believed to be the latest victim of the Love Killer, must find out who the Love Killer is.........

-Game feature-


  • The narrative of investigate and Uncertainty Emotional set in any city in the United States in the early 2000s.
  • Making choices for information or changing the ending altogether.
  • Solving puzzles to learn the game world and characters at the same time
  • You can use a PlayStation 4 or Xbox 360/One controller to play it.

You can follow the news at:https://www.facebook.com/GameLast-studio-665344880334159

data.short_description: In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately For five years, you'll play Elijah Sanders, a private investigator whose partner is Lieutenant Anthony Williams. victim woman named Kate Hernandez.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

highlighted.name: เนื้อเรื่องได้เริ่มขึ้นแล้ว
